kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Choose a number to login
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Get element text (for hybrid and mobile browser use `xpath` locator, others might cause problem)

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.doc: Get element text (for hybrid and mobile browser use `xpath` locator, others might cause problem)

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Get element text (for hybrid and mobile browser use `xpath` locator, others might cause problem)

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be String
kw.doc: Fails if the given ``item`` is not a string.

kw.name: Close All Applications
kw.doc: Closes all open applications.
